dataList.name: Black Sheet Music
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: This Gift activates when 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that apply [Sinking] Potency or Count. (Not counting E.G.O Skills)

dataList.name: Lucky Pouch
dataList.desc:

Turn Start: Units with Blunt Attack Skills(Except E.G.O Skills) gain 2 [AttackUp] and <style="upgradeHighlight">1 [HitDamageUp]</style> at Turn Start.

Units with 2+ Blunt Attack Skills gain 2 [AttackUp] and <style="upgradeHighlight">2</style> [HitDamageUp] instead.

Units with 2+ Blunt Attack Skills that use Minus Coins gain 3 [AttackUp] and <style="upgradeHighlight">3</style> [HitDamageUp] instead.

dataList.name: Clasped Sculpture
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #3, #4 Deployed Identities]

If there are 2+ remaining Coins after a Clash using a Blunt Skill, deal +10% more damage; if there are 3+ remaining Coins, deal +20% more damage; if there are 4+ remaining Coins, deal +40% more damage.

dataList.name: Clasped Sculpture+
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #3, #4, and <style="upgradeHighlight">#5</style> Deployed Identities]

If there are 2+ remaining Coins after a Clash using a Blunt Skill, deal +10% more damage; if there are 3+ remaining Coins, deal +20% more damage; if there are 4+ remaining Coins, deal +40% more damage.

dataList.name: Clasped Sculpture++
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #3, #4, #5, and <style="upgradeHighlight">#6</style> Deployed Identities]

If there are 2+ remaining Coins after a Clash using a Blunt Skill, deal <style="upgradeHighlight">+12.5%</style> more damage; if there are 3+ remaining Coins, deal <style="upgradeHighlight">+25%</style> more damage; if there are 4+ remaining Coins, deal <style="upgradeHighlight">+50%</style> more damage.

dataList.name: Crushed memory
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #3 Deployed Identity]

Blunt Attack Skills gain Clash Power +(# of Coins/3): Plus Coins gain additional Coin Power +1, Minus Coins gain additional Coin Power -1. (E.G.O Skills don't count; rounded up)

If, in this Encounter, this unit lost even a single Clash using a Blunt Attack Skill, upgrade the above effect to the following: Blunt Attack Skills gain Clash Power +(# of Coins/2): Plus Coins gain additional Coin Power +2, Minus Coins gain additional Coin power -2.

Turn End: If this unit used a Blunt Attack Skill with 3+ Coins this turn, gain 4 [HitDamageUp] next turn.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Clash Power +(# of Coins/3): Plus Coins gain additional Coin Power +1, Minus Coins gain additional Coin Power -1
Clash Power +(# of Coins/2): Plus Coins gain additional Coin Power +2, Minus Coins gain additional Coin Power -2

dataList.name: Oracle
dataList.desc: Turn End: convert 1 most-owned random E.G.O resource into 1 least-owned random E.G.O resource.

dataList.name: Imposed Weight
dataList.desc:
If there are no other allies remaining at Turn End, consume 5% of the remaining HP next turn to gain 2 [Enhancement]. (does not activate at 25%- HP)

If this unit has 50%- HP, gain 3 [Enhancement] instead.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Consume 5% of the remaining HP next turn to gain 2 [Enhancement]

dataList.name: Ebony Brooch
dataList.desc:
First Turn Start of an Encounter: Inflict 2 [Burst] Potency and Count to all enemies.

Inflict 2 [Binding] next turn at Turn End to all enemies for 3 turns.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict 2 [Burst] Potency and +2 [Burst] Count on all enemies

dataList.name: Contained Maggots
dataList.desc:
When using a Gluttony Affinity Skill(Except E.G.O Skills) against an enemy, inflict 2 [Muckworm] on target.

If the said Skill applies [Laceration] Potency, Count, or 'Unique Bleed', inflict 3 [Muckworm] instead.

dataList.name: Made-to-Order
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #3 Deployed Identity]

Encounter Start: gain +3 [Vibration] Count.

Turn Start: gain 1 [Protection], 1 [AttackDmgUp], and 1 [ResultEnhancement].

dataList.name: Haunted Shoes
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #2 Deployed Identity]

Encounter Start: gain +3 [Sinking] Count.

Turn Start: gain 1 [Protection], 1 [AttackDmgUp], and 1 [ResultEnhancement].

dataList.name: Frozen Cries
dataList.desc:
Applies only to 1 Identity with the slowest Speed at Turn Start.

If the said ally wins a Clash or is hit by an enemy, inflict 3 [Sinking] against the enemy.

dataList.name: Hoarfrost Footprint
dataList.desc:
First Turn Start of a wave: all allies gain +3 [Sinking] Count, and inflict all enemies(or all Abnormality parts) 4 [Sinking] Potency and +8 [Sinking] Count.

Enemies with [Sinking] lose 2 Clash Power; when an allied Identity wins a Clash against an affected enemy, inflict 2 [Sinking] Potency; when an allied Identity is hit by an affected enemy, inflict 3 [Sinking] Potency.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict 4 [Sinking] Potency and +8 [Sinking] Count against all enemies.

dataList.name: Nagel und Hammer Scriptures
dataList.desc:
When an ally wins a Clash using a Skill that inflicts [Laceration] Potency, Count, or 'Unique Bleed', inflict 1~2 [NailPersonality].

If the said ally is from N Corp., gain 1 Fanatic at Turn Start.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: If the unit is from N Corp., gain 1 Fanatic at Turn Start.

dataList.name: Blood-red Mane
dataList.desc:
Effects apply to all Identities with Wrath or Lust Affinity Attack Skills.

Turn End: if this unit did not take any damage from enemy Attack Skills this turn, gain 2 [Agility] and 2 [Endurance].

Turn End: if this unit did take damage from enemy Attack Skills this turn, gain 2 [Binding] and Clash Power +2 next turn.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain 2 [Binding] and Clash Power +2 next turn

dataList.name: Squalidity
dataList.desc:
When an ally attacks an enemy that has [Laceration] with a Skill that inflicts [Laceration] Potency, Count or 'Unique Bleed', deal +15% more damage against the target.

If the target has 33%- HP, inflict +25% more damage against the target instead.

dataList.name: Wholeness
dataList.desc:
If the ally wins a Clash using a Skill that inflicts [Laceration] Potency, Count, or 'Unique Bleed', inflict 2~3 [NailPersonality].

If the ally is from N Corp., gain 1 Fanatic at Turn Start, and deal +25% more damage against targets with [Laceration].

Activate a special effect when there are 5+ Identities from N Corp.:
- N Corp. Identities gain Final Power +1, Plus Coin Power +1, Minus Coin Power -1, and Attack Skills inflict +1 more [NailPersonality]. If an N Corp. Identity is at max SP at Turn Start, gain 3 [AttackDmgUp].

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: N Corp. Identities deal +25% more damage when attacking an enemy
Activate a special effect when there are 5+ N Corp. Identities

dataList.name: Spicebush Branch
dataList.desc:
For this Encounter, the following effect activates every time Skill 1, Skill 2, and Skill 3 are all used at least once.

Turn Start: gain 1 [Agility] and 1 [SkillPowerUp]. (can stack up to 3 times)

dataList.name: Kaleidoscope
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: if there are other Identities from the same faction as this unit, gain [AttackUp] equal to the number of other Identities from the same faction. (max 4)

Identities from Technology Liberation Alliance gain Clash Power +1.

dataList.name: Broken Glasses
dataList.desc:
When an ally Clashes against an enemy with a faster Speed, gain Clash Power +1.

When an ally wins a Clash against an enemy with a faster Speed, gain 2 [AttackUp] next turn (max 4.)

dataList.name: Unmailed Letter
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #1, #2 Deployed Identities]

When winning a Clash with an Attack Skill that inflicts [Burst] Potency or Count, inflict 5 [Burst] Potency and +3 [Burst] Count against the target. (once per turn per Identity)

When Clashing against an enemy with a slower Speed, gain Final Power +1 and deal +25% more damage.

When winning a Clash against an enemy with [AttackUp] buff, gain 3 [AttackUp] for the next turn, and inflict 3 [AttackDown] on the enemy that lost the Clash (absolute value 9)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Clash Win: inflict 5 [Burst] Power and +3 [Burst] Count against the target
Inflict 3 [AttackDown] against the enemy that lost the Clash

dataList.name: Harpoon Prosthetic Leg
dataList.desc:
Turn End: apply 2 [Agility], 2 [AttackUp] and 2 [AttackDmgUp] next turn to the ally with the highest sum of [Breath] Potency and Count.

The Pequod Identities gain Max Speed +1.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: The Pequod Identities gain Max Speed +1.

dataList.name: Guiding Gas Lamp
dataList.desc:
First Turn Start of a wave: all allies gain 5 [Breath] and +5 [Breath] Count.

Turn End: 1 ally with the highest sum of [Breath] Potency and Count gains 2 [Agility], 3 [AttackUp], and 3 [AttackDmgUp] next turn.

The Pequod Identities gain Skill Power +2 and Max Speed +2.

dataList.name: Chief Butler's Secret Arts
dataList.desc:
First Turn Start of a wave: select 1 enemy with the slowest Speed(or a random Abnormality part), and inflict 5 [Binding] for 5 turns starting next turn.

Clash Win: If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's, heal SP equal to the Speed difference, and gain 'Offense Level' equal to the half of that Speed difference. (only applies to the Skill used to win the Skill. Max 'Offense Level' gain: 3)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict 5 [Binding] for 5 turns starting next turn
Heal SP, and gain Offense Level equal to the amount of SP healed

dataList.name: Handheld Mirror
dataList.desc:
First Turn Start of a wave: select 2 enemies with the slowest Speed(or 2 random Abnormality parts. The effect does not stack if the enemy is singular) and inflict 5 [Binding] and 3 [DefenseDown] at Turn Start starting next turn.

When the enemy recovers from Stagger, and if they don't have any remaining Stagger Thresholds, create a new Stagger Threshold at 66% mark of the target's current HP (3 times per Encounter). If an ally Staggers an enemy with an Attack Skill(Except E.G.O Skills) that applies [Vibration] Potency or [Vibration] Count(including on self or on ally), randomly inflict [Vibration] Potency equal to half of the [Vibration] Potency on target between other enemies(or other Abnormality parts), and double the [Vibration] Potency on the Staggered target.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Turn Start: Gain 5 Bind and 3 Defense Level Down.
Create a new Stagger Threshold at 66% mark of the target's current HP
[Vibration] Potency on the Staggered target increases by x1.5

dataList.name: Hot ‘n Juicy Drumstick
dataList.desc: When inflicting [Combustion] with a Skill, inflict +3 [Combustion] Count

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: When inflicting [Combustion] with a Skill, inflict +3 [Combustion] Count

dataList.name: Dry-to-the-Bone Breast
dataList.desc: When inflicting [Burst] with a Skill, inflict +3 [Burst] Count

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: When inflicting [Burst] with a Skill, inflict +3 [Burst] Count

dataList.name: Tango Marinade
dataList.desc: If the unit's Speed is faster than the target's, gain +(Speed/3) Clash Power. (max 3)

dataList.name: Contaminated Needle & Thread
dataList.desc:
The following effect applies to the first Skill to deal damage to an enemy.

Inflict (damage dealt/3) [Laceration] Potency.

dataList.name: Sharp Needle & Thread
dataList.desc: Each turn, the first skill to deal damage to an enemy deals bonus fixed damage by half of the damage dealt.

dataList.name: Oil-gunked Spanner
dataList.desc:
Blunt Skills deal +10% more damage

Final Coin of Blunt Skills inflict 2 [Vibration] Potency On Hit. (once per turn)

dataList.name: Twinkling Scrap
dataList.desc: When an ally with Shield is hit by an enemy, reflect 3 fixed damage. (does not reflect damage when the ally did not take any Shield damage)

dataList.name: Trash Crab Brain Wine
dataList.desc:
When an ally attacks an enemy that has [Burst] with a Skill that inflicts [Burst] Potency or Count, deal +([Burst] Count x 1.25)% more damage. (max 50%)

When an ally covers from Stagger, heal 20% of max HP. (2 times per Encounter)

dataList.name: Pom-pom Hat
dataList.desc:
Turn End: gain 1 [Breath] Potency next turn for every Attack Skill that dealt damage before Turn End.

In Focused Encounters: gain 3 [Breath] Potency for every Attack Skill that dealt damage before Turn End instead.

dataList.name: Huge Gift Sack
dataList.desc: Turn Start: apply 2 [Breath], 2 [Breath] Count, and 2 [Protection] to the ally with the least HP.

dataList.name: Sad Plushie
dataList.desc:
Deal +(absolute value of SP/1.5)% more damage. (min 0%)

When an ally with Plus Coin Skills recovers from Stagger, fully heal SP. (does not activate when Corroded)

For an ally with all Minus Coin Skills: gain 3 [Paralysis] at Turn Start.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal +(absolute value of SP/1.5)% more damage. (min 0%)
When recovering from Stagger, fully heal SP

dataList.name: Black Ledger
dataList.desc:
First Turn Start of an Encounter: gain random E.G.O resources equal to the number of enemies.

If there are 4 or more Blade Lineage or Kurokumo Clan Identities participating in this Encounter, gain E.G.O resources for the least-owned E.G.O Affinity instead.

dataList.name: Rusted Hilt
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: all allies gain 1 Slash Power Up.

Blade Lineage or Kurokumo Clan Identities gain 2 Slash Power Up instead.

dataList.name: Fractured Blade
dataList.desc:
During this Encounter: when inflicting [Laceration] Potency or 'Unique Bleed' for the first time against an enemy with an Attack Skill effect, inflict an additional +2 [Laceration] Count. (Once per Encounter)

Kurokumo Clan Identities, when inflicting damage against an enemy for the first time, inflict an additional 4 [Laceration] Potency and +4 [Laceration] Count instead.

dataList.name: Broken Blade
dataList.desc:
When an ally Critically Hits an enemy, deal an additional ([Breath] Potency/3) Pride damage.

Blade Lineage Identities, when they Critically Hit an enemy, deal an additional ([Breath] Potency/2) Pride damage instead.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal an additional ([Breath] Potency/3) Pride damage.
Deal an additional ([Breath] Potency/2) Pride damage.

dataList.name: Red Tassel
dataList.desc: If the target has 1.5 or lower Slash Resistance, Slash Resistance +0.3.

dataList.name: Sublimity
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: activates when there are 3 or more Kurokumo Clan Identities.

Turn Start: all allies gain 2 Slash Power Up, and deal +35% more Slash damage.

Turn Start: when a Kurokumo Clan Identity deals damage for the first time, inflict an additional 4 [Laceration] Potency and +4 [Laceration] Count. (Once per turn)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain 2 Slash Power Up and deal +35% more Slash Damage

dataList.name: Unbending
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: activates when there are 3 or more Blade Lineage Identities.

Turn Start: all allies gain 2 Slash Power Up, and deal +35% more Slash damage.

Turn Start: when a Blade Lineage Identity hits critically, deal additional Pride damage equal to [Breath] Potency on self.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain 2 Slash Power Up and deal +35% more Slash Damage
Deal additional Pride damage equal to [Breath] Potency on self

dataList.name: Ragged Bamboo Hat
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: activates when there are 3 or more Blade Lineage Identities.

All allies deal +50% more Slash damage

Blade Lineage Identities: if the ally has [Breath], Critical rate is fixed to 100%.

Blade Lineage Identities: inflict x1.5 more damage on Crit

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal 1.5 times more damage on Crit

dataList.name: Old Dopo Robe
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: activates when there are 3 or more Blade Lineage Identities.

All allies deal +50% more Slash damage.

Blade Lineage Identities: Skill 1 gains Coin Power +1. Single-Coin Skill 1 gains Coin Power +3.

[Blade Lineage Mentor Meursault Only] 'Yield My Flesh' Skill Final Clash Power -12; 'To Claim Their Bones' Skill deals +50% more damage.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: 'Yield My Flesh' Skill Final Clash Power -12; 'To Claim Your Bones' deals +50% more damage

dataList.name: Reverberation+
dataList.desc:
Turn End: Inflict 2 [Binding] and <style="upgradeHighlight">2 [DefenseDown]</style> to enemies (for Abnormalities, their Parts) with <style="upgradeHighlight">8</style>+ [Vibration] Potency.

If the target has <style="upgradeHighlight">15</style>+ [Vibration] Potency, apply 2 [Binding], 1 [Paralysis], <style="upgradeHighlight">and 2 [DefenseDown]</style> instead.

dataList.name: Reverberation++
dataList.desc:
Turn End: Inflict 3 [Binding] and <style="upgradeHighlight">3</style> [DefenseDown] to enemies (for Abnormalities, their Parts) with <style="upgradeHighlight">5</style>+ [Vibration] Potency.

If the target has <style="upgradeHighlight">10</style>+ [Vibration] Potency, apply 2 [Binding], 1 [Paralysis], and <style="upgradeHighlight">4</style> [DefenseDown] instead.

dataList.name: Smoking Gunpowder+
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #1, #2, and <style="upgradeHighlight">#3</style> Deployed Identities]

Turn End: If an Attack Skill inflicting [Burst] Potency or Count has been used at least once this turn, gain 1 [Agility] next turn.

If this unit's Speed is at <style="upgradeHighlight">5</style>+, Attack Skills inflicting [Burst] Potency or Count deal <style="upgradeHighlight">+15%</style> more damage.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: If conditions are met: gain 1 [Agility] next turn.
If conditions are met: deal +15% more damage

dataList.name: Smoking Gunpowder++
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #1, #2, and #3 Deployed Identities]

Turn End: If an Attack Skill inflicting [Burst] Potency or Count has been used at least once this turn, gain <style="upgradeHighlight">1~2</style> [Agility] next turn.

If this unit's Speed is at <style="upgradeHighlight">4</style>+, Attack Skills inflicting [Burst] Potency or Count deal <style="upgradeHighlight">+20%</style> more damage.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: If conditions are met: gain 1~2 [Agility] next turn.
If conditions are met: deal +20% more damage
